frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-sensory-perception
frozen.shortDescription: Requires lm-sensors (or lm_sensors). Shows CPU temperature, disk temperature, video card temperature, voltage and fan RPM.
frozen.longDescription: Requires lm-sensors (or lm_sensors). Shows CPU temperature, disk temperature, video card temperature, voltage and fan RPM.
